Package com.loginradius.sdk.api

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlbumAPI
    The AlbumAPI is used to get the Album data from the user’s social account.
    AudioAPI
    The AudioAPI is used to get audio files data from the user’s social account.
    CheckInAPI
    The Check In API is used to get check-ins data from the user’s social account.
    CompanyAPI
    The Company API is used to get the followed company’s data in the user’s social account.
    ContactAPI
    The Contact API is used to get contacts/friends/connections data from the user’s social account.
    EventAPI
    The Event API is used to get the event data from the user’s social account.
    FollowingAPI
    The Following API is used to get the followers’ information from the user’s social account.
    GroupAPI
    The Group API is used to get group data from the user’s social account.
    LikeAPI
    The Likes API is used to get likes data from the user’s social account.
    LoginRadiusAPI
    LoginRadiusAPI base class
    MentionAPI
    The Mention API is used to get mention data from the user’s social account.
    MessageSendAPI
    The MessageSend API is used to post messages to the user’s contacts.
    PageAPI
    The Page API is used to get the page data from the user’s social account.
    PhotoAPI
    The photo API is used to get photo data from the user’s social account.
    PostAPI
    The Post API is used to get posted messages from the user’s social account.
    StatusAPI  
    StatusUpdateAPI
    The Status API is used to get the status messages from the user’s social account.
    UserProfileAPI
    The User Profile API is used to get social profile data from the user’s social account after authentication.
    VideoAPI
    The Video API is used to get videos data from the user’s social account.
